website_summaries.verdict: Durable yet lightweight pegs (2) with adapter for full compatibility with 3/8-inch axle bikes.
pros: Made of strong yet lightweight aluminum encased by polycarbonate sleeve, for more durable pegs than any plastic ones
Compatible with both 14 millimeter and 3/8-inch axles, and includes adapter for full 3/8-inch compatibility
Pegs come in 11 different, awesome colors
Manufacturer offers a 90-day money back guarantee
cons: Also, polycarbonate sleeve is slippery when the rider stands on it while doing tricks

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these
customer_reviews.text: This are very nice pegs I got them for my framed impact
customer_reviews.author: Andrew cook

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice peg set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice peg set for your bmx. These are more of a seafoam green then an actual teal or aqua but they are nice none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Orders extra sleeves if ur grinding rough areas a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, the cover is pretty strong and slides on metal well. Would recommend for a beginner to grinds or someone looking to save some weight and money. Since the cover is clear, the anodized aluminum surface stays fresh and keeps its color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pegs Great that they're modular for long life good length good diameters. Plenty of colors
customer_reviews.author: judd osborne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my daughters bike. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, awesome colors
customer_reviews.text: They work great for my sons BMX bike. He has really enjoyed them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: great pegs
customer_reviews.text: easy install, great fit, and the clear PVC sleeve make the anadized blue finish really pop
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome looking.
customer_reviews.text: I have a trans green Subrosa OM frame. They are like a spot on match. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for price $$$
customer_reviews.text: I am a bmx rider my self I think the are great cause the price cause fitbikeco/cult pegs are like $15 each peg. And yes you can do all the tricks on these. I learned double pegs and febble’s on them. 🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲🚲
customer_reviews.author: Andy BMX

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut the plastic to make it fit on my front wheel and now I’m afraid to even grind on it
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Rad Pegs
customer_reviews.text: These pegs are great! Not for the hardcore street rider, but grind descent. I like them best for flatland. The other set with the clear plastic sleeve is the way to go for you street guys.
customer_reviews.author: Don Minor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves them! Easy to install. Would definitely buy them again but I doubt I’d have too.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffylyn

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for some good lightweight pegs for flatland BMX, these are perfect, super light weight and they don't spin I'll update in the durability
customer_reviews.author: Jt Swindle

customer_reviews.title: Good pegs for the money
customer_reviews.text: They are durable and well made pegs but you grind alot slower so I recommend using wax with these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 9yr old grandson. He loves them. They are a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Karin G.

customer_reviews.title: These Pegs
customer_reviews.text: Love these pegs. They slide so much faster then metal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pegs for my son they work great he loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: looks great and the sender got it to me pronto for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift but know nothing about bike pegs. The quality, however, looks great and the sender got it to me pronto for Christmas which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More durable then i thought super light and slide super fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came with no instructions to install. How do we put these on?
customer_reviews.author: Garry Gouger

customer_reviews.title: Two pegs for the price and supper light and durable
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck. Note that these are sleeved which makes them even more adapted for street grinding cubs ect. You do get two pegs for price. I also put them both in back and give my kids a ride with no issue of the sleeves moving.
customer_reviews.author: MR-FLIP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for all types of grinding , lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.author: Jade Lynn Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The problem with these pegs is that they have a ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem with these pegs is that they have a hard plastic surrounding around the medal that spins, so if you try to stand on them to do a trick, you slip off.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Westmark

product_meta.title: 25NINE BMX Bike Pegs – Aluminum Core with PC Outer Sleeve – Multiple Color Options
feature_bullets: 90 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - We are so sure you’ll be happy with your purchase that we offer a 90-Day Money-Back Guarantee to ensure customer satisfaction of our products. If for any reason you wish to discontinue using the product, we will promptly issue a refund.
COMPATIBILITY – Compatible with both 14mm and 3/8 inch axles. Use the included adapter to make the pegs fully compatible with 3/8 axles.
QUALITY – Constructed with a lightweight and durable 7075 aluminum core encased in a polycarbonate (PC) sleeve. Much more durable then all plastic pegs.
